# s3pro

Lightweight, feature-rich, object-oriented S3 client

## Quick start

```bash
pip install s3pro
```

## Contribute

Issue Tracker: <https://gitlab.com/rocshers/python/s3pro/-/issues>  
Source Code: <https://gitlab.com/rocshers/python/s3pro>

Before adding changes:

```bash
make install-dev
```

After changes:

```bash
make format test
```
